steps.step: To access the layers on a map, click on the down arrow to the right of the Legend Dropdown List.
To adjust the transparency of a layer set, move the slider bar left or right.
Click the down arrow to the left of the layer group to expand it.
To turn the WELL (INDUSTRY) layer ON, click the checkbox to the left of WELL (INDUSTRY).
To turn the WELL layer OFF, click the checkbox to the left of WELL.
To view only the visible layers on the map, click the checkbox to the left of Visible Only.
